subject: Converting tests from JUnit 3.x to JUnit 4, part 1
msgSnippet: To see what s involved in getting 3.x-style tests moved over to version 4-style tests, I started working with the tests for Jaggregate
messageBody:
To see what's involved in getting 3.x-style tests moved over to
version 4-style tests, I started working with the tests for Jaggregate
(http://jaggregate.sf.net), my Java 5-only project. I've written a
blog entry containing my initial findings:

http://cleveralias.blogs.com/thought_spearmints/2005/11/converting_test.html

Hope this is useful. I'll tackle more migration soon.

cheers,
Paul Holser
